title: Windows 10 download
body: Howdy, So i've never done this before but I'll be straight to the point. I try to download this game onto a Windows 10 computer, 64Bit home but it tells me to save it as a binary download. I tried to covert it to .exe. but says the PVP net is not working and crashes. Any ideas to fix this?

replies.body:
That's pretty weird! Can you reinstall the game using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)? Simply check the boxes for *Reinstall* and *Clean Uninstall*, then start. 

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
